text: The polar night is when it stays dark outside for more than twenty four hours. This occurs only inside the polar circles (the northernmost and southernmost areas on Earth). A lot of times It will be a polar night for the winter and the opposite happens in the summer. == References == == Other websites == * The polar night and polar darkness * Many years' of webcam pictures from Troms√∏, Norway.
